name: Elvin Imperial State
startIntroPart1: The Elvin Imperial State: An Imitation of Glory
startIntroPart2: After years of civil war, one faction rose above the ruins of the old Elvin Empire. One that has far less kind intentions than the last.
declaringWar: You simply have no place for this world. Now lay down and die for the good of all of us.
defeated: A tragedy had befallen world itself! Now the impure and evil shall rule these lands forever more...!
introduction: Who are you, ones so pathetic that they don't deserve to grovel before us?
neutralNo: As with all the impure, you are nothing worthy.
Do you seriously think I would agree?
neutralYes: You're lucky, I rarely accept proposals from lesser beings.
hateLetsHearIt: I will listen, but you shall bow before me first.
hateNo: You would think I would say 'yes' to such a sorry creature?
I only listen to those greater than specks of dirt.
hateYes: So what's next? Should we celebrate? HAHAHA! how sad.
You are spared for but a few moments
I expected more, so give me more!
afterPeace: We accept this treaty, but for true peace, we shall not accept. We WILL return...
tradeRequest: So it seems the lesser ones have value after all. Now give us what we want.
uniques: [-50]% unhappiness from the number of cities

name: Sentinal Union, 1st Core
startIntroPart1: The Senta 1st Core: A Gang of Warmongers
startIntroPart2:
Senta as a state had one constant: War

Although many of its people who live today have mellowed and accepted peace, there are still those who seek to rekindle the spark of war.
declaringWar: WE CAN'T WAIT NO MORE, WEGOTTAGOWEGOTTAGO. *IT'S WAR SEASON, BOYS!*
attacked: YEEESSSS! YEEEEEEESSSSSSS! NOW THAT'S WHAT I'M TALKING ABOUT!
defeated: Our land has been destroyed, but not our purpose! For we have passed it on to you. Now go, DESTROY!
introduction: Hey fellas, say, who's up for a fight?
neutralLetsHearIt: I'm all ears, don't be shy.
Is it about war? Please do tell!
neutralNo: Sorry, man, it just ain't right.
That ain't good enough,and you know that.
neutralYes: Oho! Looks like we got a negotiator here!
hateLetsHearIt: There somethin' you got? Aight, let's make it quick.
hateNo: I'd like to see you say that to my face!
hateYes: I hate ya'... but damn ain't that a good deal!
Okay, but we still ain't friends.
tradeRequest: Hey hey, listen, I want something from ya'...
uniques: [+50]% XP gained from combat <when at war>
Units in cities cost no Maintenance
[+200]% maintenance cost for buildings [in all cities]

name: Jirbalimah Emirate
startIntroPart1: Jirbalimah Emirate: A Breeze in a Windless Desert
startIntroPart2: Over the years, the Jirbalimah Emirate had taken the brunt of Elvin imperialism, despite them being the same species, their different toned skin and radically different culture was enough to declare them as 'impure', with new found freedom and a longing sense of hate, they will enact revenge against their oppressors.
declaringWar: We are not as malevolent as our Imperial counterparts, we shall give you mercy upon defeat!
attacked: You... you *DARE* declare *WAR* on *I*? A *SON* of the *Great Prophet's* bloodline!?
defeated: My brothers... my sisters... our children... I have failed you all...
introduction: Greetings, I am Lomleol, a member of the Great Prophet's bloodline, say, would you care for a cup of gold?
neutralLetsHearIt: Do not fret with your words, speak what your heart tells you.
You desire an audience with me?
My friend, you can talk to me any time of the day!
neutralNo: It is simply not to my standards, no?
What you have is not what I currently desire .
neutralYes: This is simply a sublime gift!
hateHello: What now? You are wasting my time.
hateNo: I never should have said bothered.
I would kill you if it wouldn't cause a war.
hateYes: By the Prophet's grace, why must this lowlife seduce my desires?
You have what you want. Don't come back here again.
Good, now get out of my sight.
afterPeace: My heart is burdened for our people's suffering, may this peace bring healing and prosperity to the both of us.
tradeRequest: What an honor for you, I want something that you have.
uniques: [+1 Gold, +2 Food] from [Desert] tiles [in all cities]
Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [+25]% more Influence
[+50]% maintenance cost for buildings [in all cities]

name: Sentinal Union, 4th Core
startIntroPart1: The Senta 4th Core: A Drop of Reason in an Ocean of Insanity
startIntroPart2: The 4th Core was made to be responsible for the defense of the Sentinal homeland, but even they couldn't ingore the call to war, while not as aggressive as their 1st Core brethren, their stalwart defense will break an attacker's weapons and leave its wielder open.
declaringWar: Hey man, it ain't my fault or yours, I just gotta do what I've been told by my superiors.
attacked: It was expected, it was you or me, so I don't blame you.
defeated: That-.... hmm.... Well uhh...... that could've gone a lot better......
introduction: Hey there, I'm Craig Caston, but just call me Craig. We're just here to make friends, alright?
neutralLetsHearIt: Well as they say the: ''pen is mightier than the sword'', right...?
Nice to have people like you around.
neutralNo: After a long debate with my superiors... no.
neutralYes: I really can't say ''no'', can I?
hateLetsHearIt: You can speak, but will I listen?
hateNo: In another universe, I still would have said no.
hateYes: I hope this leads to us being friends.
afterPeace: I'm just glad it's over, but that bastard Jehonas would've been livid. HAHAHA!
uniques: [+2 Culture, +2 Production] from [Hill] tiles [in all cities]
[+4 Culture, +4 Production] from [Mountain] tiles [in all cities]
[20]% Strength decreasing with distance from capital
[+15]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies
[+100]% maintenance cost for buildings [in all cities]
